alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 5:41AM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin, Southern Franklin, Western Clinton and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EDT today. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to rise above freezing by late morning. Sub-freezing temperatures are expected to linger the longest north of the Route 11 corridor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
